template.name: Antminer S9i
template.description:
Just put "S9i.info.sh" file to the Zabbix ExternalScripts directory (/etc/zabbix/externalscripts by default). Required utilites: nc, timeout, time. only bash, no perl, no python and no etc
If you like my work, please consider donating: BTC: 39DyYL4NxvBv1BTR7RK9UJJisqhTCQhFFa Dmitry Dvinskikh <dima@tevirp.ru>

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 Pool N{#POOL} is not Alive
{HOST.NAME} S9 S BM ACN N{#ACN} chips problem
{HOST.NAME} S9 S BM hashrate on N {#ACN} <90%
{HOST.NAME} S9 S BM N{#ACN} chips problem

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 POOLS BM has no data

dependency.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 S BM resp is not suc
{HOST.NAME} S9 S BM resp is not suc

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 S BM hashrate is 0 ({$S9_0_SEC} sec)

dependency.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 S BM has no data

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 S BM has no data

dependency.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 S BM resp is not suc

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 S BM N of ACN changed!
{HOST.NAME} S9 S BM N of fans changed!
{HOST.NAME} S9 S BM N of miners changed
{HOST.NAME} S9 S BM resp is not suc
